The crack is not as difficult to apply as the instructions lead you to believe.

1. install beyond the sword
2. go to the BTS app in the BTS folder
3. right click the "beyond the sword" app and show package contents
4. get info on "contents"
5. give read/write access to everyone and click on the gear to apply to contents.
6. run the patch on the BTS app.
7. done.
